verses.roman:
govindere mahāprabhu kairāche niyama
'mora pāda-jala yena nā laya kona jana'

synonyms: govindere—unto Govinda; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kairāche—has given; niyama—a regulative principle; mora—My; pāda-jala—water from washing the feet; yena—that; nā laya—does not take; kona jana—anyone.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu ordered His personal servant Govinda that no one should take the water that had washed His feet.
